name: @logo-software/leftbar
description: Leftbar is part of the Logo Elements Environment. This library is a navigational part of the apps and shared by products within a platform. It provides a common set of interaction patterns that persist between and across products also standartization of navigation between apps and user information presentation.

scripts.postversion:
echo '#########
### Versioning to:' $npm_package_version '
### CommandPATH: ' $INIT_CWD '
#########' && git status
scripts.git-commit: git add -A . && git commit . -m $TYPE'('$npm_package_name'): upgrading to v.'$npm_package_version
scripts.git-release: git add -A . && git commit . -m $TYPE'('$npm_package_name'): cut the v.'$npm_package_version' release'
scripts.patch:commit: npm run ver:patch && npm run build && TYPE=fix npm run git-commit && npm run tag
scripts.minor:commit: npm run ver:minor && npm run build && TYPE=feat npm run git-commit && npm run tag
scripts.pre:commit: npm run ver:pre && npm run build && TYPE=prerelease npm run git-commit && npm run tag
scripts.major:commit: npm run ver:major && npm run build && TYPE=release npm run git-release && npm run tag
